summary: AI Health Zon: Professional healthcare enterprise website with RCM-first positioning targeting hospital decision-makers. The platform features 10-phase revenue cycle management workflow, Healthcare Technology solutions, and Healthcare Connecting Platform. Primary goal: Generate Demo Bookings for RCM through strong CTA-driven conversion.
architectural_notes: Searchable directory with filters (location, category, services)
AI chatbot integration for contact page
Admin approval workflow for stakeholder registrations (careers, vendors, ambulance, NGO)
Status tracking system: Pending → Approved → Rejected
PIN code-based auto-fill for city/state in registration forms using PIN code lookup API or database

Opening animation showcases 10-phase RCM workflow: Registration & Eligibility → Pre-Authorization → Admission & Documentation → Medical Coding → Billing & Claims → Submission → Query Management → Adjudication → Payment Posting → Reconciliation & Closure
RCM-first positioning: Revenue Cycle Management is the primary focus with highest visual weight and placement
Enterprise target audience: Hospital decision-makers, CFOs, administrators
Knowledge Board page replaces Dashboard, focusing on educational content about hospital licenses and regulatory requirements
known_issues: Chatbot not functioning on the website
Text with multicolor gradient overlays on images is not displaying/visualizing properly
Content not displaying completely on small/mobile viewports - layout overflow or sizing issue
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional illustration showing hospital license documents and regulatory compliance (hospital-licenses-hero.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Icon or illustration representing healthcare regulatory compliance and accreditation (compliance-standards.dim_800x600.png)
- Visual representation of hospital registration and licensing process flowchart (licensing-process.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a Home page with hero section displaying the master brand line: 'AI Health Zon is an AI-powered healthcare platform delivering Revenue Cycle Management, Healthcare Technology solutions, and a Healthcare Connecting Platform that links hospitals with doctors, nurses, radiologists, physiotherapists, dietitians, ambulance services, diagnostics, pharmacies, vendors, insurance partners, NGOs, and compliance experts on one unified digital platform.' Include two CTA buttons: 'Request Demo' and 'Join Network'.

Add a Three Vertical Overview section on the Home page with cards for: (1) RCM - AI-powered billing, claims, denial management, revenue optimization; (2) Healthcare Technology - AI dashboards, system integration, compliance support; (3) Connecting Platform - Workforce, ambulance, labs, pharmacies, vendors, NGOs.
Create a 'How It Works' section on the Home page showing three steps: Register → Verified → Start using, with visual indicators or icons for each step.
Add quick links section on the Home page with navigation to: Careers, Vendors, Ambulance, and NGO registration pages.
Include a testimonials placeholder section on the Home page with space for future testimonial content.
Add a future vision snippet on the Home page displaying: 'Future-ready AI healthcare ecosystem'.
Create an About Us page with Company Overview section covering mission, vision, and core purpose.
Add 'Why Choose Us' section to the About Us page highlighting benefits for hospitals, professionals, vendors, and NGOs.
Include Three Verticals Overview on the About Us page with bullet points for: RCM, Technology, and Connecting Platform verticals.
Add Compliance & Accreditation section to the About Us page covering NABH, Licensing, and data security.
Include 'Our Impact' section on the About Us page with success stories and placeholders for metrics.

Create a Solutions page with Vertical 1 - Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) section detailing: Eligibility & pre-authorization, Medical billing & coding, Claims management & tracking, Denial prediction & follow-up, AR & revenue dashboards.

Add Vertical 2 - Healthcare Technology section to the Solutions page covering: AI dashboards & analytics, HIS/EHR integration, NABH & Licensing support, Telemedicine & remote monitoring, Data security & compliance.

Add Vertical 3 - Healthcare Connecting Platform section to the Solutions page listing: Workforce (doctors, nurses, radiologists, physiotherapists, dietitians, coders, RCM staff), Emergency & ambulance services, Diagnostics & labs, Pharmacies & medicine suppliers, Vendors & service providers, NGOs & community support, Insurance partners & TPAs.

Create a Healthcare Support System page with sections for: Workforce Support (all clinical & administrative staff), Emergency & Ambulance (services, ICU transport, event support), Diagnostics & Labs (pathology, radiology, imaging, home sample collection), Pharmacy & Medicines (hospital, retail, supply chain), Home Healthcare (home nursing, physiotherapy, elderly care), Mental Health & Wellness (counselors, rehab, psychological support), Vendors & Suppliers (equipment, IT, facility services), NGOs & Community Support (blood banks, NGOs, volunteers), Compliance & Quality Support (NABH, licensing, audit support), Insurance & TPA Coordination, Training & Education, Logistics & Supply Chain.

Create a Network Directory page with searchable directory listings for: Hospitals & Clinics, Workforce (Doctors, Nurses, Radiologists, Physios, Dietitians), Ambulance & Emergency Services, Diagnostics & Labs, Pharmacies, Vendors & Suppliers, Insurance & TPAs, NGOs & Community Organizations, Compliance Experts. Include filters for Location, Category, and Services. Each profile should show Services, Contact information, and Partnership Option.

Create a Careers & Profile Submission page listing job opportunities for: Doctors, Nurses, Radiologists, Physiotherapists, Dietitians, Medical Coders, RCM Staff, Insurance Staff, Security, Housekeeping, Admin. Include an application form with fields: Name, Role, Experience, Location, Phone, Email, Upload CV. Display benefits: Visibility, Hospital connections, Career growth.
Create a Vendors page with vendor registration for: Equipment, IT & Software, Pharmacy, Facility Services. Display benefits: Leads, Hospital tie-ups, Visibility. Include a vendor directory listing.

Create an Ambulance Services page with registration for ambulance services covering: Emergency, ICU, Event support. Display benefits: Faster response, Hospital requests, Network listing. Implement location-based search functionality.

Create an NGO Listing page with NGO directory for: Health NGOs, Blood banks, Relief organizations. Include filters for Location, Focus Area, and Services. Add NGO registration form with fields: Name, Registration No, Focus Area, Services, Contact. Display programs section covering: Blood drives, Camps, Awareness, Disaster support.

Create a Dashboard page with role-based sections for logged-in users: Hospitals (Revenue dashboard, Claim status, Staff requests, Vendor management, Compliance tracking), Professionals (Profile, Job leads, Assignments), Vendors (Leads, Orders, Payments), NGOs (Programs, Volunteer coordination).
Create a Contact page with sections for: Address, Email, Phone, WhatsApp Button, AI Chatbot, and Inquiry Form.
Create three legal pages: Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy. Each page should be accessible from the footer.

Implement a main navigation system that provides access to all pages: Home, About Us, Solutions, Healthcare Support System, Network Directory, Careers, Vendors, Ambulance Services, NGO Listing, Dashboard (when logged in), and Contact. Include footer navigation to legal pages.

Design a cohesive visual theme for the AI Health Zon platform that conveys professionalism, trust, and innovation in healthcare technology. Use a modern, clean design with healthcare-appropriate colors (avoid blue & purple), clear typography, and consistent spacing. Apply this theme uniformly across all pages with appropriate use of whitespace, card layouts for content sections, and clear visual hierarchy.
Update the phone number displayed on the Contact page to +91-8696766966
Implement a functional AI chatbot widget on the Contact page that allows users to interact with an assistant for inquiries and support
Update the entire platform color theme to use Royal Teal as the primary accent color and Royal White as the background/neutral color throughout all pages

Create a new interactive onboarding/landing page that displays before the main home page, featuring a game-like animation sequence where different stakeholders (hospitals, doctors, nurses, vendors, ambulance services, NGOs, pharmacies, labs) send join requests to AI Health Zon, the platform receives and approves these requests with visual feedback, and stakeholders display happy/peaceful reactions upon approval
Update the application routing to make the new onboarding page the initial landing page, with automatic or user-triggered progression to the existing home page

Update existing registration forms (Careers, Vendors, Ambulance Services, NGO Listing pages) to submit requests with Pending status instead of directly creating active profiles
Add a notification badge or counter in the Admin Dashboard navigation link showing the total number of pending requests awaiting approval
Include contact action buttons in each request detail view that allow opening WhatsApp chat or initiating email with the stakeholder using their submitted contact information

Add a PIN code input field to the NGO Listing registration form (frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx) that accepts manual entry of 6-digit postal codes

Implement auto-fill functionality that automatically populates the city and state fields when a valid PIN code is entered in the Ambulance Services registration form
Implement auto-fill functionality that automatically populates the city and state fields when a valid PIN code is entered in the NGO Listing registration form

Replace all existing hero carousel images on the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) with full HD versions (1920x1080 resolution minimum) representing RCM, Healthcare Technology solutions, and connecting platform services

Replace all section images on the About Us page (frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx) with full HD versions (minimum 1200x800) matching section headings: mission, vision, core values, why choose us, three verticals overview, compliance & accreditation, and our impact

Create a new Home page for the document processing application with a hero section explaining the app's purpose: converting PDF and scanned documents into structured formats
Implement a file upload interface on the Home page that accepts PDF files and common image formats (JPEG, PNG, TIFF) for scanned documents
Create a Documents page that displays a list of all uploaded documents with their processing status, filename, upload date, and action buttons
Create a Document Viewer page that displays the structured output of a processed document with proper formatting for headings, paragraphs, tables, and lists
Add export functionality that allows users to download structured document data in JSON and plain text formats
Update the Navigation component to include links to Home (upload), Documents (list), and user authentication
Implement React Query hooks in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts for uploading documents, fetching document list, retrieving structured output, and exporting data
Apply the existing McKinsey-inspired professional design theme with multicolor gradient typography to all new pages and components

Create a PatientJourney page component at frontend/src/pages/PatientJourney.tsx that displays a hero section explaining the patient journey document library feature for hospitals to organize and save sample documents across patient care phases

Display the 10-phase Patient Journey Document Flow on the PatientJourney page with expandable or card-based sections for: (1) Patient Entry & Registration, (2) Initial Clinical Evaluation, (3) Investigation & Diagnostics, (4) Treatment Planning, (5) Nursing Care & Monitoring, (6) Pre-Operative Phase, (7) Intra-Procedure / OT Phase, (8) Post-Procedure / Recovery Phase, (9) Discharge Planning & Exit, (10) Legal & Record Closure

Display document type lists within each phase section showing all required document types: Phase 1 (Registration Form, General Consent), Phase 2 (Clinical Assessment, Progress Notes for initial assessment), Phase 3 (Microbiology Requisition Form, Monitoring Sheet for vitals/inputs-outputs/observations), Phase 4 (Medication Chart, Progress Notes for treatment plan & daily review), Phase 5 (Nursing Chart, Monitoring Sheet ongoing), Phase 6 (Pre-Anaesthetic Checkup Form, Pre-Operative Orders/Surgical Docket Booklet, Procedure Consent), Phase 7 (Procedure Consent verified, Progress Notes for operative/procedure notes), Phase 8 (Monitoring Sheet, Medication Chart, Nursing Chart, Progress Notes post-op/post-procedure), Phase 9 (Discharge Document, Progress Notes for final summary & instructions), Phase 10 (All Consents general + procedure, Completed Charts & Forms filed in patient record)
Implement file upload functionality within each phase section that allows hospitals to upload and save sample documents for each document type to their library
Display uploaded sample documents within each phase section showing filename, upload date, and action buttons for preview/download
Add React Query hooks in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts for uploading patient journey sample documents, fetching document lists by phase, and retrieving document blobs
Add a 'Patient Journey' navigation link in the Navigation component (frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx) that routes to /patient-journey
Add route definition for /patient-journey in frontend/src/App.tsx that renders the PatientJourney page component within the Layout wrapper

Replace the existing onboarding animation sequence on the Onboarding page (frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx) with a new 10-phase healthcare revenue cycle management workflow animation that displays the complete patient journey from registration through payment reconciliation and closure

Implement Phase 1 - Patient Registration & Eligibility Verification section displaying objective (Ensure correct patient & insurance data before treatment starts), process steps (Patient demographic entry, ABHA/Policy ID capture, Scheme verification TPA/Insurance/Govt panel, E-card validation, Pre-existing condition check), and control points (ID proof upload, Active policy confirmation, Correct beneficiary details)

Implement Phase 2 - Financial Clearance & Pre-Authorization section displaying objective (Secure treatment approval before procedure), process steps (Clinical summary preparation, Tentative package selection, Medical documents upload, Portal submission, Tracking approval status), special note for Ayushman Bharat scheme compliance, and control points (Correct package coding, Clinical justification matching guidelines, Document checklist completeness)

Implement Phase 3 - Admission & Treatment Documentation section displaying objective (Maintain complete medico-legal & billing support record), documents required list (Admission note, Investigation reports, Doctor daily progress notes, OT notes if surgery, Implant stickers if applicable, Nursing charts), and control points (Time consistency, Clinical correlation, Avoid over-documentation mismatch)

Implement Phase 4 - Medical Coding & Package Mapping section displaying objective (Convert clinical data into billable codes), steps (ICD coding, Procedure mapping, Package validation, LOS validation Length of Stay), and control points (Code vs diagnosis match, No unbundled billing, Scheme rate compliance)

Implement Phase 5 - Billing & Claim File Preparation section displaying objective (Prepare clean claim file with zero deficiencies), claim file includes list (Final bill, Discharge summary, Investigation reports, Implant invoice if applicable, Pre-auth approval copy), and control points (Arithmetic accuracy, Same diagnosis everywhere, Proper document indexing)

Implement Phase 6 - Claim Submission section displaying submission channels (Insurance Portal, TPA Portal, Govt Scheme Portal), process steps (Online upload, Claim ID generation, Acknowledgment tracking), and control points (Submission within timeline, Correct amount declaration, No missing attachment)

Implement Phase 7 - Query Management section displaying objective (Prevent rejection & defend claim medically), process steps (Track query timeline, Root cause analysis, Draft structured reply, Upload additional docs), strong reply structure requirements (Clinical necessity, Radiological evidence, Guideline reference, Package justification)

Implement Phase 8 - Claim Adjudication & Approval section displaying possible outcomes (Full approval, Partial deduction, Rejection), and action items (Deduction analysis, Compare against approved package, Validate medical reasoning)

Implement Phase 9 - Payment Posting section displaying objective (Match approved amount with bank credit), and steps (Bank reconciliation, Claim ID mapping, Deduction entry, Outstanding balance recording)

Implement Phase 10 - Payment Reconciliation & Closure section displaying final reconciliation checklist (Approved vs Received Amount Match, TDS deducted calculation, Short payment identification, Appeal for unjustified deduction, Claim status marked Closed)

Apply the existing McKinsey-inspired professional design theme with multicolor gradient typography to the updated onboarding animation, ensuring consistent visual presentation with the rest of the platform
Implement smooth transitions or animations between the 10 phases in the onboarding sequence, with either automatic progression or user-triggered navigation to advance through phases

Maintain the existing routing behavior where the onboarding page displays first and then progresses to the main home page, but update the content to show the new 10-phase RCM workflow instead of the stakeholder join request animation

Verify the Onboarding page (frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx) displaying the 10-phase healthcare revenue cycle management workflow animation remains as the initial landing page before progression to the Home page

Confirm the routing configuration in frontend/src/App.tsx maintains both the onboarding workflow (as initial landing) and the home page (as secondary destination) with proper navigation flow between them

Update the Onboarding page (frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx) 10-phase RCM workflow animation layout to ensure all phase sections display completely without overflow on mobile and small screen viewports (< 768px width)

Update responsive breakpoints and container max-widths in frontend/tailwind.config.js to ensure consistent mobile-friendly layouts across all pages that prevent content overflow on viewports smaller than 768px

Add responsive viewport meta tag verification and mobile-specific CSS rules in frontend/index.css to prevent content overflow, ensuring proper scaling on mobile devices with viewport widths from 320px to 768px

Update the Navigation component (frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx) to ensure the mobile menu, navigation links, and notification badges display completely without overflow on small screen viewports (< 768px width)

Review and update all page components (About Us, Solutions, Healthcare Support System, Network Directory, Patient Journey, Contact) to ensure responsive layouts prevent content overflow on mobile viewports (< 768px width) with proper text wrapping and image scaling

Create a BlogArticle page component at frontend/src/pages/BlogArticle.tsx that displays full article content with proper heading hierarchy (H1 for title, H2/H3 for content sections), formatted paragraphs, and SEO meta tags

Create a Case Studies page component at frontend/src/pages/CaseStudies.tsx as a future-ready placeholder with hero section, empty state message, and structure for displaying success stories when content is added
Add route definition for '/case-studies' in frontend/src/App.tsx rendering the CaseStudies page component within the Layout wrapper, and add 'Case Studies' link to main navigation

Update the Navigation component (frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx) to reorder navigation links following enterprise hierarchy: Home, Solutions, Case Studies, Blog, About Us, Contact Us, with conditional Dashboard/Admin links when authenticated

Update all major pages (Home, Solutions RCM section, About Us, Case Studies, Blog, Contact) to include at least three CTAs: Top CTA (in hero/banner), Mid-page CTA (in content section), and Bottom CTA (before footer), all encouraging demo bookings
Reduce all animations across the site to minimal, professional transitions. Remove flashy or heavy animations in favor of subtle fade/slide effects with short durations

Optimize all images across the site for web delivery: compress images, use appropriate formats (WebP where supported), implement lazy loading, and ensure images are properly sized for their display contexts

Ensure all pages follow SEO best practices: clean URL structure (no special characters, lowercase, hyphens), proper H1/H2/H3 heading hierarchy, descriptive page titles, meta descriptions for all pages, and semantic HTML structure
Add schema.org structured data markup to key pages (Home, Solutions RCM, About, Contact) using Healthcare Organization and Medical Business schemas to improve search engine understanding

Implement comprehensive mobile responsive design across all pages ensuring layouts adapt properly for viewports from 320px to 768px width, with touch-friendly interactive elements and readable text sizes
Optimize frontend performance to achieve page load times under 3 seconds and pass Core Web Vitals metrics (LCP < 2.5s, FID < 100ms, CLS < 0.1)
Add React Query hook in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts for fetching demo booking requests (admin only) with automatic refetching when new submissions occur

Update all form components across the application (Careers, Vendors, Ambulance Services, NGO Listing, Demo Booking, Contact inquiry) to display with Royal Teal background color and Royal White text color for all form fields, labels, and submit buttons

Update the Onboarding page (frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx) title and hero heading to display 'Healthcare Revenue Cycle Management - Complete 10-Phase Journey from Patient Registration to Payment Closure - AI Health Zon'

Create a Members page component at frontend/src/pages/Members.tsx that displays a photo grid of all approved network members (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulance services) with type/category labels visible on each card

Implement click-to-view functionality on the Members page that opens a detailed profile modal or navigates to a profile detail view when a member card is clicked, displaying comprehensive information including bio, services, experience, and contact options

Add React Query hook in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts for fetching all approved members across all stakeholder types (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulance services) for display on the Members page
Add a 'Members' navigation link in the Navigation component (frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx) that routes to the new Members page
Add route definition for '/members' in frontend/src/App.tsx that renders the Members page component within the Layout wrapper

Update the Vendors page (frontend/src/pages/Vendors.tsx) category select dropdown to display with Royal Teal background color and white text color for all dropdown options when the menu is open

Update the NGO Listing page (frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx) focus area select dropdown to display with Royal Teal background color and white text color for all dropdown options when the menu is open

Update the Footer component (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx) to display info@aihealthzon.com as the contact email in the footer section
Update the Chatbot component (frontend/src/components/Chatbot.tsx) to provide info@aihealthzon.com when users ask for contact information or email address
Update any inquiry forms across the application to configure auto-reply emails with info@aihealthzon.com as the sender or reply-to address

Replace all 12 service category images on the Healthcare Support System page (frontend/src/pages/HealthcareSupportSystem.tsx) with contextually relevant, high-quality images that visually represent each healthcare support service area: Workforce Support, Emergency & Ambulance Services, Diagnostics & Labs, Pharmacy & Medicines, Home Healthcare, Mental Health & Wellness, Vendors & Suppliers, NGOs & Community Support, Compliance & Quality Support, Insurance & TPA Coordination, Training & Education, and Logistics & Supply Chain

Update the Navigation component (frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx) to replace the 'Dashboard' link with a 'Knowledge Board' link that routes to '/knowledge-board'
Apply the existing enterprise design theme (White background, Deep Blue text, professional typography) to the Knowledge Board page ensuring visual consistency with other pages
Add multiple CTAs on the Knowledge Board page including top CTA in hero section, mid-page CTA in content area, and bottom CTA before footer, all encouraging demo bookings

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with hero section, three verticals overview, how it works, testimonials
About Us page with company overview, why choose us, verticals, compliance, impact
Solutions page detailing RCM, Healthcare Technology, and Connecting Platform verticals
Healthcare Support System page covering workforce, emergency, diagnostics, pharmacy, vendors, NGOs, compliance
Network Directory page with searchable listings and filters for all stakeholders
Careers & Profile Submission page with job opportunities and application form
Vendors page with registration, benefits, and directory
Ambulance Services page with registration and location-based search
NGO Listing page with directory, filters, registration, and programs
Contact page with address, WhatsApp, AI chatbot, inquiry form
Legal pages: Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, Refund Policy
Interactive opening/landing page with gamified stakeholder onboarding animation showing requests being received and approved
Admin Dashboard with pending requests section, approval workflow, and status tracking for all stakeholder registrations

Add backend data structures and storage for tracking registration requests with status field supporting Pending, Approved, and Rejected states for healthcare professionals, vendors, ambulance services, and NGO submissions
Implement backend approval workflow that creates active stakeholder profiles (healthcare professional, vendor, ambulance service, or NGO) in the main data stores when a request is approved
Add PIN code field to all registration forms (careers, vendors, ambulance, NGO)
Implement auto-fill functionality that populates city and state fields when PIN code is entered in registration forms
Add a world map visualization that auto-updates when stakeholders join the network (after admin approval)
Add a backend method to retrieve all approved stakeholder locations (city, state, PIN code) aggregated from healthcare professionals, vendors, ambulance services, and NGOs with 'Approved' status
Update home page hero image/design to match style from www.ttphealth.in
Add 3 animating images in hero section of home page with text overlay, similar to ttphealth.in animation
Update entire site color scheme to white background with teal text/accents, and orange header color
Update font color throughout the site to orange
Update the global color scheme in frontend/index.css to change all primary text colors from teal to orange throughout the entire site
Update frontend/tailwind.config.js to set orange as the default text color in the Tailwind configuration
Update all page components (Home, About, Solutions, Dashboard, Contact, etc.) to ensure text elements render in orange color, replacing any existing teal text colors
Update the Navigation component (frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx) to use orange text color for navigation links and menu items
Update the Footer component (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx) to use orange text color for all footer text, links, and headings

Update the entire site theme and color scheme to match the professional style from McKinsey's business-building healthcare page (https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building), including color palette, typography, spacing, and visual design patterns

Create a new document processing app that converts PDF and scanned documents into structured format
Create backend data structures in backend/main.mo to store uploaded document metadata including filename, file type, upload timestamp, processing status, and user identity
Implement backend methods in backend/main.mo to receive and store uploaded PDF and scan files as blobs with associated metadata
Implement backend logic in backend/main.mo to extract text content from uploaded documents and structure it into organized sections with headings, paragraphs, tables, and lists

Implement backend data structure in backend/main.mo to store patient journey document templates organized by 10 phases: Registration, Clinical Evaluation, Diagnostics, Treatment Planning, Nursing Care, Pre-Operative, Intra-Procedure, Post-Procedure, Discharge, and Legal/Record Closure

Add document upload functionality to each phase section allowing hospitals to save sample documents for each document type in their library
Implement document listing/viewer within each phase showing uploaded sample documents with filename, upload date, and preview/download options
Add a navigation link to 'Patient Journey' in the Navigation component that routes to the new patient journey document library page

Create backend data structure in backend/main.mo to store patient journey document templates with fields for phase number, phase name, document type name, uploaded file blob, filename, upload timestamp, and hospital identity
Implement backend methods in backend/main.mo to save uploaded patient journey sample documents with phase, document type, file blob, and metadata
Implement backend query method in backend/main.mo to retrieve all patient journey sample documents for the authenticated hospital, optionally filtered by phase number

Ensure the existing Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) remains accessible and fully functional with all current content including hero carousel with rotating images, three vertical overview cards (RCM, Healthcare Technology, Connecting Platform), value propositions with icons, and CTA buttons ('Request Demo' and 'Join Network')
Adjust responsive layout/viewport sizing to ensure all content is fully visible on smaller screens without overflow
Add 'Show Interest to Join' buttons to all 12 service categories on Healthcare Support System page
Update dropdown styling to display options with white text on Royal Teal background

Restructure homepage with enterprise focus: hero section with Book Demo + Explore Solutions CTAs, Why Choose Us section with 4-6 icon-based benefits, 3-card Solutions Overview (RCM, Technology, Network), RCM Highlight section with bigger visual weight, Impact Metrics section with animated counters, CTA Banner for Schedule Consultation

Create enterprise-focused RCM landing page with sections: Banner with CTA, Problem Statement (Denials/Delays/Revenue Leakage), Modular Feature Blocks, Workflow Diagram, Revenue Impact Metrics, FAQ, Demo Booking CTA
Implement Demo Booking Form with fields: Name, Hospital Name, Designation, Mobile, Email, City, Message. Include auto email confirmation, database capture, and admin email notification
Add floating WhatsApp button (bottom-right corner) for instant communication
Create dynamic Blog section with CMS capabilities: category-based filtering, search functionality, editable meta titles/descriptions for SEO
Create Case Studies page placeholder (future-ready) for showcasing success stories
Update entire site color palette to: White + Deep Blue + Light Grey. Remove current orange/teal colors. Apply corporate dashboard-style design influence with clean healthcare enterprise theme
Update typography: bold headlines, medium-weight body text, modern sans-serif font (Inter or Poppins style). Minimal animations for professional look
Implement comprehensive SEO: clean URL structure, proper H1/H2/H3 hierarchy, schema markup (Healthcare/Business), fast loading speed, mobile responsive, Core Web Vitals optimization
Implement performance requirements: page load < 3 seconds, optimized images, CDN enabled, lightweight animations (no heavy JS libraries)
Implement security: HTTPS mandatory, reCAPTCHA on forms, admin panel role-based login, daily backup integration
Build modular architecture for future scalability: support for new solution pages, landing pages, case study uploads, video testimonials, partner logos
Implement CTA strategy: every major page must include Top CTA, Mid-page CTA, and Bottom CTA. Primary conversion event: Demo Request
Prioritize content hierarchy: RCM gets highest visual weight and best placement, followed by Technology Integration and Ecosystem Network
